items.name: app-api-auth
items.docs:
--- What's next? ---

  1. Rename `.example.env` to `.env.development`.
  2. Update the necessary environment variables in `.env.development`.
  3. Execute `npm --env-file=.env.development drizzle-kit push` to create PostgreSQL tables.
  4. Start the development server with `npm run dev`.
  5. Access http://localhost:3000/access to test the sign-in/sign-up functionality.
  6. Navigate to http://localhost:3000/x to verify the protected route.
